attributes.action: institute a Travel Ban and Asset Freeze against all Ministers, Governors and Members of the National Assembly of the Federal Republic of Nigeria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Federal Republic of Nigeria has been in crisis of one form of another since the early 1990’s the perpetrators of these troubles travel freely for vacations, business trips, medical appointments, shopping trips etc
To prevent a complete collapse of this nation along the lines of Zimbabwe or Rwanda we request that the Prime Minister use his good offices to ensure that the below are subject to an EU Travel bans and their UK assets frozen
•All members of the Federal Executive Council, their special advisers, Permanent Secretaries and families 
•Directors of Federal Commissions, Boards, Corporations or other Government mandated bodies and their family members 
•All State Governors, Commissioners, State Permanent Secretaries and their family members 
•All Local Government Chairmen, their senior officials and families
•All past Heads of State, Ministers, State Governors and their families
•All members of the Board of Trustees of the Peoples Democratic Party and their families
•The Heads of the Armed Forces, Police and Customs
